Feb. 19, 1966 D Scottish Championship (Fourth Section)
Scottish Championship (Fourth Section) 40 Test Piece Contest Scottish Championship scottish-championship-fourth-section National Championship of Great Britain (Fourth Section Final)
Scotland
Fourth
Rufford Abbey
Sacred Heart Church Hall, Edinburgh, City of Edinburgh, Scotland, UK Deportment: MacTaggart Scott
The adjudicator shown in the printed programme is Cecil Peacock, but he could not attend and Harry Oakes deputised for him (confirmed from newspaper report).
